se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.utility

Class DebugImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.soprasteria.automatedtesting.webdriver.api.utility.DebugImage

  • public class DebugImage
extends java.lang.Object
    A debugimage is a collection of images all merged into one big image. The idea is that you during the course of a test can add images for debugpurposes. The images will be added one above eachother.

    • Constructor Summary

      DebugImage()

    • Method Detail

      • appendImage

        public static void appendImage(org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger,
                               java.lang.String fileName,
                               java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                               java.lang.String text,
                               java.awt.Color color,
                               int x,
                               int y,
                               int width,
                               int height)
        Append a new image into the debugimage. A new image will be appended below the previous one. You can specify a text to write on the image as well as dimensions for a box to highlight in the image.
        Parameters:
        logger -
        fileName - - file name of the saved image
        color - - color to set on the graphics that is added on the image
        image - - Image to append.
        text - - Descriptive text to write into image.
        x - - x value from left for highlighted area.
        y - - y value from top for highlighted area.
        width - - Width of the highlighted box.
        height - - Width of the highlighted box.

      • appendImage

        public static void appendImage(org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger,
                               java.lang.String fileName,
                               java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
                               java.lang.String text,
                               java.awt.Color color)
        Append a new image into the debugimage. A new image will be appended below the previous one. You can specify a text to write on the image as well as dimensions for a box to highlight in the image.
        Parameters:
        logger -
        image - - Image to append.
        text - - Descriptive text to write into image.
        fileName - - file name of the saved image
        color - - color to set on the graphics that is added on the image
